subject: Relationships
title: No Contact: The Science Behind the Rule
description: A short lesson to help you apply No Contact: The Science Behind the Rule.

hook.text: Every text to your ex resets the withdrawal clock. Neuroscience says no contact is the fastest path to recovery.

buildup.text: Contact with an ex triggers dopamine hits that reinforce the addiction cycle. Each interaction feeds the craving.

discovery.text: Studies show people who maintain no contact recover 40% faster than those who stay in touch with their ex.

twist.text: No contact feels cruel â€” but it's self-preservation. You can't heal a burn while still touching the flame.

climax.text: No contact isn't punishment. It's giving your brain the space it needs to rewire away from the addiction.

punchline.text: No contact isn't cruelty. It's the fastest path to healing.

quiz.question: How much faster do people recover with no contact?
